sentences.en: Aromatherapy has been used since the ancient times to purify and harmonise the body and soul.
sentences.cn: 自古以来,香熏已被使用于净化及治疗身心.

sentences.en: For a watch, you must harmonise the crystal, the movement and the band individually.
sentences.cn: 对于手表, 您必须为石英 、 机件和表带分别确定协调代码.

sentences.en: I'd like the colours to harmonise.
The colours do not seem to harmonise ( with each other ) at all.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色显得一点也不协调.

sentences.en: The pressure is increasing to harmonise global accounting standards.
sentences.cn: 统一全球会计准则的压力与日俱增.

sentences.en: The singing teacher taught them to harmonise the new song.
sentences.cn: 音乐教师教他们用和声演唱这首新歌.

sentences.en: Two adjusting screws harmonise the guns with the sight.
sentences.cn: 有两个调节钮来校准武器和瞄准具.
